'''Karmaphala Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Karmaphala Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Karmaphala Wood can be found at [[Pardis Dhyai]], [[Port Ormos]], and [[Gandharva Ville]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=441 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Karmaphala derives from {{Lang|{{w|Karma}}|sa=कर्म|sa_rm=karma}} meaning "actions" or "work," and {{Lang|{{w|Phala}}|sa=फल|sa_rm=phala}} meaning "fruit," "fruition" or "effects." As such, {{Lang|{{w|Karmaphala}} means "the fruit of one's actions"|sa=कर्मफल|sa_rm=}}.
